TEXT.S: Bob Anderegg sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1937, ryax sa tay 24 nqu tay 8, Bob Anderegg, squliq na p'unro. qnxan nya Bob Anderegg htagan beh sa Monroe, Wisconsin. sraral mqwas biru beh Monroe High School. Bob Anderegg mzyu' mari maki Michigan hopa pqwasan biru. kawas tay 2008,Bob Anderegg magal Wisconsin Basketball Coaches Association(WBCA) Hall of Fame.
